name: Zen Puzzle!
description:
Match rows within the 8x8 playing field. Play the most relaxing Zen mode you have ever come across. Think strategically to master the puzzle and reach the highest score. Harder than you think!

Beautifully challenging yet addictive puzzle game about connecting the pops, the higher the number of the tile, the better! More relaxing than yoga, addictive and super fun!
